name: What mermaids do when they're bored
name_original: What mermaids do when they're bored
description:
" Do you know what mermaids do when they are bored?

They play a platform game of course! with special rules! "

Turn the board to move the statue! And bring it all the way down, right?

Collect golden shells to get the best trophy!

HTML5 LINK : https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/716546

CONTROL :

KEYBOARD:

USE A and D to rotate the board, use SPACE or ENTER to valid in menu.

GAMEPAD:

USE STICK (left and right) to rotate the board, use BUTTON A to valid in menu.

Thanks for playing !

SOFTWARE USED and CREDITS :

Font used is BABY KRUFFY from Dafont.com.

ENGINE used is GAMEMAKER STUDIO 1.4.

PAINT.NET and FIREALPACA for Graphics.

MUSICMAKERJAM for musics.

CHIPTONES for sounds.

All the assets were made during the duration of the jam by me.
